means: （因热力，严寒、干燥、年老等而）枯萎，皱缩( shrivel的过去式和过去分词 )

PerfectNetExp.abs: Gan1 | 法汉字典 ... 干燥 to dry 干瘪 dried out;wizened;shriveled 干扰素 interferon.
and a man with a shriveled hand was there . looking a reason to accuse Jesus , they asked him , " Is it lawful to heal on the Sabbath ? " "那里有一个人枯乾了一只手。有人问耶稣说、安息日治病、可以不可以．意思是要控告他。
Her shriveled up little monkey boy ., 她那皱皮小猴子是的男孩.
and a man with a shriveled hand was there ., 那里有一个人 , 枯干了一只手.

list.abs: To wither or shrivel or mature imperfectly ., 枯萎枯萎 , 萎缩或发育不良.
in the long drought , the leaves shriveled up and died., 由于久旱 , 树叶都枯萎而死了.
shrivel 皱缩；萎缩；收缩；超皱；枯萎shrivelled apple 干缩苹果shroud 胴体包布
in fact , the butterfly spent rest of its life crawling with a swollen body and shriveled wings .事实上，蝴蝶的余生就只能靠肿胀的身体和萎缩的翅膀爬行了。

means.word_mean: 1. (used especially of vegetation) having lost all moisture;

sentences.sentence: "the desert was edged with sere vegetation"

means.word_mean: 2. lean and wrinkled by shrinkage as from age or illness;

sentences.sentence: "a lanky scarecrow of a man with withered face and lantern jaws"-W.F.Starkie
"he did well despite his withered arm"
"a wizened little man with frizzy gray hair"

means.word_mean: 3. reduced in efficacy or vitality or intensity;

sentences.sentence: "as the project wore on she found her enthusiasm shriveled"

auth_sentence.content: But I knew something was wrong when the bright yellow new leaves that follow the flowers turned brown and shriveled up.
